posts.post_title: FS: NEW Lot of 20 T205 w/ Tougher Backs, HOF's, SP's **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly nicer looking low to mid-grade cards with a few beaters in the bunch, as the scans will show.

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing SOLD cards for easier viewing):

Ferguson - $23
Gardner - $21
Herzog - $25
McConnell (oversized borders) - $25
Murphy - $25
Payne (Sovereign) - $20
Phelps - $21
Rowan - $65
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
Final price drop to clear out the last few of these.  Still some nice cards remaining.  Thanks for looking!
